text: Stoker is a 2013 British-American drama thriller movie. It was directed by Park Chan-wook.Park Chan-Wook's English-Language Debut 'Stoker' Hits Theaters On March 1, 2013 . The movie stars Mia Wasikowska, Nicole Kidman and Matthew Goode. == Plot == After India's father dies in an auto accident, her Uncle Charlie, who she never knew existed, comes to live with her and her emotionally unstable mother. Soon after his arrival, she comes to suspect this mysterious, charming man has ulterior motives, but instead of feeling outrage or horror, this friendless girl becomes increasingly infatuated with him. == Cast == *Mia Wasikowska as India Stoker *Matthew Goode as Charlie Stoker *Nicole Kidman as Evelyn Stoker *Dermot Mulroney as Richard Stoker *Jacki Weaver as Aunt Gwendolyn "Gin" Stoker *Lucas Till as Chris Pitts *Alden Ehrenreich as Whip Taylor *Phyllis Somerville as Mrs. McGarrick *Ralph Brown as Sheriff Howard *Judith Godr√®che as Doctor Jacquin == References == == Other websites == * http://www.foxsearchlight.com/stoker/ * * * Category:2013 drama thriller movies Category:2010s psychological movies Category:2010s serial killer movies Category:American drama thriller movies Category:American psychological movies Category:American serial killer movies Category:Antisocial personality disorder in fiction Category:2010s British drama movies Category:British drama thriller movies Category:2010s English- language movies Category:Movies about death Category:Movies about dysfunctional families Category:Movies about siblings Category:American independent movies
title: Stoker (movie)
